sentences.en: All of these agencies and people either complement or facilitate our work, or express the health needs of populations.
sentences.cn: 所有这些机构和人士要么补充或便利我们的工作，要么表达人民的卫生需求。

sentences.en: Each side undertakes to facilitate the further development of such contacts and exchanges.
sentences.cn: 双方各自承诺对进一步发展这种联系和交流提供便利.

sentences.en: If it would facilitate matters, I would be happy to come to New York.
sentences.cn: 如果对事态发展有利，我很乐意来纽约。

sentences.en: In order to facilitate the registration and evaluation of holograms, the holodiagram was developed.
sentences.cn: 为了使全息图易于记录和计算,研究出一种全息析纹图.

sentences.en: It would not facilitate matters if you were uncooperative.
sentences.cn: 如果你不合作,事情就不好办了.
许多现代发明便利了家务劳动.

sentences.en: Some other materials are added to facilitate extrusion and other manufacturing operations.
sentences.cn: 添加其它的一些物质是为了使挤压和别的加工过程更为方便.
有条理的教导有利于学习。

sentences.en: The new airport will facilitate the development of tourism.
sentences.cn: 新机场将促进旅游业的发展。

sentences.en: The new trade agreement should facilitate more rapid economic growth.
sentences.cn: 新贸易协定应当会加快经济发展。

sentences.en: The purpose of ( a ) is to facilitate fiberization and of ( b ) to reduce crystallizing tendency.
sentences.cn: 办法 ( a ) 的目的是改善纤维形成,办法 ( b ) 的目的是减少折晶倾向.

sentences.en: These large populations facilitate the detection of rare mutational or recombinational events.
sentences.cn: 这样的大群体有利于检出稀有的突变或重组子.

sentences.en: They agree to facilitate the progressive development of trade between their two countries.
sentences.cn: 它们同意为逐步发展两国间的贸易提供便利.

sentences.en: To facilitate bone patching, they have pins, screws, plates.
sentences.cn: 为了有利于骨骼的修补, 他们采用了针 、 螺丝和金属板.

sentences.en: To facilitate the calculation of commutators, we list identities.
sentences.cn: 为了便于计算对易子, 我们列出一些恒等式.

sentences.en: Zip codes are used to facilitate mail service.
sentences.cn: 邮政编码方便了邮递服务.

words.tran_cn: 简易化；[生理] 助长；容易

trans.tran_en: To facilitate an action or process, especially one that you would like to happen, means to make it easier or more likely to happen

trans.tran_cn: 使…变得容易， 使便利； 推动； 促进
trans.tran_en: To facilitate an action or process, especially one that you would like to happen, means to make it easier or more likely to happen
